Direct Known Subclasses:
ReaderException, WriterException, ReedSolomonException, IOException, ClassNotFoundException, IllegalAccessException, InstantiationException, InterruptedException, RuntimeException, CardException, LandmarkException, LocationException, MediaException, MIDletStateChangeException, PIMException, RecordStoreException, FaultDetailException, ParserConfigurationException, MessagingException, InvalidIDException, SendCommandException, JILWidgetException, RenderingException, CommandMetadataException, CryptoException, TranscoderRegistrationException, CommandException, DataTypeException, DatabaseException, DatabaseOptionsSetException, SchemaException, DRMException, IDNAException, MalformedURIException, MessagingException, LocatorException, MapException, TravelTimeException, LDAPException, MIMEParsingException, SmartCardException, ApplicationManagerException, KeyHandlerRegistryException, MagnetometerCalibrationException, RadioException, SIMCardException, UserAuthenticationException, WidgetException, ParserConfigurationException, TLSException, MediaException, JSONException, SAXException
public class Exception
extends Throwable

The class Exception and its subclasses are a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

See Also:
Error
Since:
JDK1.0
